title: Measuring the performance of advertisements
description: Information about which advertisement is shown to you and how you respond to it can be used to determine how well an advertisement in relation to you or other users has worked and whether the goals of the advertisement have been achieved.For example, whether you have seen an advertisement, whether you have clicked on it, or the advertisement has led you to buy a product or visit a website, etc. This is very useful to map the relevance of advertising campaigns.
